title: Ticket #1546: Report dependencies of periodic_* experssions in log messages
description:
When a periodic_* expression fires, you get a user log event that looks like this: 

012 (184.000.000) 07/30 14:35:44 Job was held.
        The job attribute PeriodicHold expression 'submit_host_overloaded || error_condition || other_reason' evaluated to TRUE
        Code 0 Subcode 0
...

It can be a nuisance to determine what part of a complex expression triggered, especially if the job has since changed state. As such, a user requested the ability to see all dependent expressions at the time the expression was tested.
